WhatsApp Business API

Design, integrate, and automate WhatsApp experiences for sales, support, and notifications. From Meta Cloud API onboarding to message templates, webhooks, and CRM flows.

  • Meta Cloud API setup and verification
  • Message templates and interactive flows
  • Webhook processing & CRM integration
  • Compliance and throughput tuning

Applied AI

Pragmatic, value-first AI solutions: LLM-driven chat, RAG search, and automation that plugs into your existing systems safely and measurably.

  • LLM chatbots and assistants
  • RAG search over your docs & data
  • Prompt, evals, and guardrails
  • MLOps and monitoring

DevOps & Platform

From CI/CD to scalable, secure cloud infrastructure. IaC, containers, observability, and cost-aware performance tuning.

  • CI/CD and release automation
  • Kubernetes/Containers and IaC
  • Observability (logs, metrics, traces)
  • Security and cost optimization
